Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) jm_bgColor = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoomto(SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:rainbow() self:diffusealpha(0) self:effectperiod(32) self:effectclock('bgm') self:hidden(0) end
%function(self) jm_bgSquares = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:diffuse(1,1,1,0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,4,4) self:zoom(SCREEN_WIDTH/256*1.5) self:hidden(0) end
